short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the user to select text and run a query with the selected text on multiple website platforms

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple and efficient tool to help users search selected text on commonly visited websites with a single press of a button. Just select whatever text you would like to inspect and click the associated letter on your keyboard for the selected text to be searched on that website. Click on the magnifying glass icon on the top right to see the legend for the 5 websites currently associated. More websites and the option of using custom websites will come in later updates. Stay tuned!

*(Example) -  Say you are reading an online article and would like to search a mysterious word (words) on Wikipedia; simply select the word (words) and press the "w" key on your keyboard. You will immediately be sent to Wikipedia and your selected text will be searched!
